In multiple places the `UppercaseInitial/PackageName` naming convention is hardcoded. This
• goes against the DRY principle
• should at least in some places instead use the path recorded in `Registry.toml`
• will fall flat if <https://github.com/JuliaRegistries/RegistryTools.jl/pull/38> is merged and put to use.
